name: Fairy Dust
description:
For every child that has ever wanted to see a fairy....

This app is mainly meant for younger children. It is a bit dated now, augmented reality has come a long way since this app was first written, but for younger kids it is still fun.

I originally wrote it for my own children, if you do download it I hope your kids get some joy out of it. They might need to be shown how to look around in a big circle, and if they are very young might need some help to catch the fast fairies.

With the last update three of the models broke (Spring/Summer/Autumn) and have been removed. I intend to update them if I can.

See fairies in the world around you.
This amazing app allows your iphone or ipad camera to see into the fairy realm.
It alerts you when a fairy is near and if you look around with the
camera, you will be able to find the fairy.
Tap the fairy on the screen and she will know you are there and might reward
you with fairy dust. The more fairy dust you collect, the more fairies you can see.
- 15 fairies to discover.
- A beautiful book detailing the fairies you have seen.
- Fun for kids from 4 to 80.
- Nothing more to buy.
